column2: UPDATE 1-GE launches sales process for U.S. lending units NEW YORK
column3: May 31 General Electric Co has launched the sales process for a roughly $40 billion portion of its U.S. commercial lending assets as a part of its broad retreat from its finance businesses
column4: a source familiar with the situation said on Sunday.
